source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video. The primary motion is the dramatic, swirling dance of the green aurora across the night sky. The clouds also drift slowly above the horizon.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video. The primary motion is the dramatic, swirling dance of the green aurora across the night sky. The clouds also drift slowly above the horizon.

generated_critique: The caption begins with "This is a time-lapse video," which describes the filming technique rather than the motion of the subject as instructed. The phrase "dramatic, swirling dance" uses a subjective adjective ("dramatic") and an abstract metaphor ("dance"), which should be avoided in favor of a more direct description of the movement. A better caption would focus only on the visible motion, describing how the green aurora swirls and shifts across the sky above the slowly drifting clouds.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The green aurora swirls and shifts across the night sky. Below, clouds drift slowly above the horizon.
